service.name: Dissolving & Cosmetic Correction

seo.title: Filler Dissolving & Cosmetic Correction in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Fix migration, asymmetry, or outcomes you don’t love with expert assessment and hyaluronidase when appropriate.

overview.p1: If you’re unhappy with filler—migration, lumps, or shape—hyaluronidase can selectively dissolve HA to reset.
overview.p2: We assess safely, treat conservatively, and map next steps so you regain confidence in your features.

whyReluxe.title: Correction expertise
whyReluxe.body: Careful evaluation and conservative dissolving for control.

whyReluxe.title: Safety first
whyReluxe.body: Protocols ready for rare reactions; anatomy-aware approach.

service.tagline: Fix asymmetry, migration, or outcomes you don’t love.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: We’ll assess and create a plan to correct and optimize your results.

items.heading: Next steps
items.body: May recommend a healing window prior to refilling.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
